          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of crystals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Kristalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation des cristaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação dos cristais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione dei cristalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των κρυστάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de cristales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that large crystals form slowly and small crystals form fast.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß dieses große 
Kristallformular langsam und kleine Kristalle schnell bilden Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que cette grande forme 
de cristaux lentement et petits cristaux formez rapidement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que esse formulário 
grande dos cristais lentamente e cristais pequenos dê forma 
rapidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che quella grande 
forma dei cristalli lentamente e piccoli cristalli formi velocemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η μεγάλη μορφή 
κρυστάλλων αργά και τα μικρά κρύσταλλα διαμορφώνουν γρήγορα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que esa forma grande de
los cristales lentamente y los cristales pequeños forme rápidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kristalle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
